title: Discovery Service
description: Information that describes an instance of SWIM Discovery Services (SDS).

id.description: The identifier by which the service is uniquely referenced.

name.description: The full name and acronym of the service.

operations.description: A list of operations offered by the service.

see also.description: A reference to an external resource (e.g., a registry) for extended documentation.

operation.description: An operation offered by the service.
